turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like to order a coffee to pick up at a local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one on North Beach Street in Fort Worth, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will like a ice pumpkin spiced chai latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, pumpkin spice is a seasonal drink and is not currently being offered. bummer! did you want another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Then how about an iced cold foam cappuccino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you add whipped cream to the top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a grande iced cold foam cappuccino with whipped cream from starbucks on north beach street in forth worth texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, ma'am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.50 is your total. should i submit the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. the drink will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt has been sent to your mobile device. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome.
